name: Smartwool Curated Shore Fun No Show - Unisex
description: Add some warmth and sunshine to your wardrobe, anytime of the year. These no-show socks are made with a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy all day.Ultralight with no cushioning to glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching.Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability.Internal heel gripper and arch brace hold sock securely in place.Supportive arch brace hugs your foot for a snug fit.Virtually Seamless™ toe won't cause hotspots or chafing.
